CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

MOT provides word when Chi struggles , and gives encouraging comments; much of the reading is Mot giving words and Chi echoing them very closely; in fact Chi may be reading some of these herself , but it's hard to tell because of the poor quality of the tape; somewhere around the Saturday foods Mot takes over and Chi is only echoing certain words rather than reading; but Mot reads pretty slowly and carefully so Chi can follow along

u.a: Chi seated on Mot's lap . Mot holds book as Chi turns pages Chi guides herself along with her finger
very hard to tell if Mot started saying day before Chi
Chi reacts to pictures as she turns the pages .
echoing; Mot is clearly in control of the reading
MOT points to a word in book as Chi reads word
Chi echoing Mot; phone has started ringing again
MOT begins reading story as Chi listens and reacts
